description: Built for ocean adventures the Moku Pae brings a modern approach to the traditional boat shoe. Constructed with breathable mesh for barefoot wear, signature Drop-In-Heel for easy/off and non-marking rubber outsole.
name: Olukai Moku Pae - Mens

specs.value: A minimally lined, breathable engineered mesh upper with a stretch air mesh tongue and gusset and welded accents for seamless fit
Dual-density anatomical PU footbed with a gel insert. Soft, quick-drying single layer mesh footbed cover for maximum comfort and breathability. Removable and washable
Lightweight and high rebound EVA midsole for excellent underfoot comfort and sustained support over time. Non-marking Wet-Grip Rubber outsole with lugged, articulating pod design
